Description.Details: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. AC/10s suffer from <color=#dd7e6b> -2 Recoil/refire penalty </color>, when continuously fired. Your pilots guts skill can counteract this. Additionally, <color=#f79924>AC10s have a damage variance of +/- 5 points of damage.</color>
